interface.name: LabelPeer
interface.javadoc: The peer interface for {@link Label}. The peer interfaces are intended only for use in porting the AWT. They are not intended for use by application developers, and developers should not implement peers nor invoke any of the peer methods directly on the peer instances.

Sets the text to be displayed on the label.
label the text to be displayed on the label
Label#setText

Sets the alignment of the label text.
alignment the alignment of the label text
Label#setAlignment(int)
Label#CENTER
Label#RIGHT
Label#LEFT
